document.full_text: a man acting erratically and carrying an unidentified package on a river near a virginia nuclear power plant on friday has been taken into custody, police said on friday.
document.title: man with package near virginia nuclear plant taken into custody
lines_and_colors: a man acting erratically and carrying an unidentified package on a river near a virginia nuclear power plant on friday has been taken into custody, police said on friday.
